Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.utils

Class InputVerifier

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.utils.InputVerifier
public class InputVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
This class has the goal of checking that the selected action by the user is valid

  • Method Details

    • canProduce

      public boolean canProduce​(ProductionCombo chosenProductionCombo)
      Checks if user can activate a production
      Parameters:
      chosenProductionCombo - a production combo which includes all choices made by user
      Returns:
      true if request is valid, false otherwise

    • canTake

      public boolean canTake​(java.lang.String place, int index)
      Checks if user can take resource from market
      Parameters:
      place - string value which should either be "row" or "column", indicates the place from which user wants to pick a resource from market
      index - the number of the row/column from which user wants to pick a resource from market
      Returns:
      true if request is valid, false otherwise

    • canBuy

      public boolean canBuy​(Level chosenLevel, Color chosenColor, int developmentCardSlotIndex, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> depotsResources, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> strongboxResources)
      Checks if user can buy the selected development card
      Parameters:
      chosenLevel - level of chosen development card
      chosenColor - color of chosen development card
      developmentCardSlotIndex - index of development card slot where user wants to place new card
      depotsResources - map of resources which will be discarded from depots or store leader cards
      strongboxResources - map of resources which will be discarded from strongbox
      Returns:
      true if request is valid, false otherwise

    • canActivate

      public boolean canActivate​(DumbLeaderCard leaderCard)
      Checks if user can discard selected leader card
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - leader card which user wants to activate
      Returns:
      true if request is valid, false otherwise

    • canDiscard

      public boolean canDiscard​(DumbLeaderCard leaderCard)
      Checks if user can discard selected leader card
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - leader card which user wants to discard
      Returns:
      true if request is valid, false otherwise

      public boolean canPickResources​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> pickedResources)
      Checks if selected resources in pregame are correct
      Parameters:
      pickedResources - resource chosen by user in pregame
      Returns:
      true if request is valid, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Checks if the chosen market marbles are a valid selection
      Parameters:
      chosenMarbles - map of chosen market marbles
      Returns:
      true if request is valid, false otherwise
